From the brand

Bamworld brings modern designs to transform your home that will surely space saving need for your home. In addition, we offers a variety of furniture for different families. We believe that quality material and unique design can get more customers love. so we design and produce different furniture for you to live a more comfortable and stylish life.

Large Plant Stand

Corner Plant Stand

Tall Plant Stand

【7 Pots Plant Stand】Unique design capable of holding 7 pot plants. The plant stand can be used as a decorative piece to organize your selection of plants. The stand is suitable for use indoors and outdoors.
【Durable And Sturdy】Wider width (12 inch) and clever use of the triangle stability principle makes the wood plant holder more stable.Also, plastic joints consolidate this plant stand.All of these give you more durable structure.
【Natural Wood With Carbonization】This plant rack is made of natural wood which underwent 1000 °F high temperature carbonization. Because of the carbonization process, no varnish or paint is required thus it is more safe for use and environmentally friendly
【Easy To Assemble】Explicit instruction and plastic joints make it easy to assemble. You may finish it within 15 minutes. We also offer you all tools may need.
【180 Days Worry-free Warranty】We offer 180 days warranty and 24h friendly customer service. If there are ever any issues about the product, please feel free to contact us and we will give you a free replacement or full refund.

function isValidUrl(url) {
if (!url) {
return false;
}
var encodedUrl = encodeURI(url);
return encodedUrl.match(
/^(https?:\/\/)?(([a-z0-9-]|%[A-F0-9]{2})+\.)+(([a-z]|%[A-F0-9]{2})([a-z0-9]|%[A-F0-9]{2})*)(:[0-9]+)?(\/[a-z0-9;:,~!+#@&=%\/$\.?_-]+)?$/
);
}

function isNumericPrice(price) {
if (!price) {
return false;
}
return price.match(/^([0-9]+\.?[0-9]*)$|^([0-9]*\.[0-9]+)$/);
}

function isEmptyValue(input) {
return !input || input.length === 0 || input.match(/^\s*$/);
}

function truncate(input, length) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.substr(0, length);
}
}

function formatDate(year, date, month) {
return year + ‘-‘ + month + ‘-‘ + date;
}

function trim(input) {
if (!input) {
return ”;
} else {
return input.trim();
}
}

function resetModalToInitialState(currentMonth, currentDate, currentYear) {
var enableOnlineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_onlineRadio’);
var enableOfflineStoreRadio = document.querySelector(‘#pricingFeedback_offlineRadio’);

var offlineMonth = document.querySelector(‘#offlineMonth’);

thankYouDiv.innerHTML = ”;

offlineStoreName.value = ”;
offlineCity.value = ”;
offlineState.value = ”;
offlinePriceRaw.value = ”;

stateDefaultOption.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();
stateDefaultPrompt.innerHTML = $(“#selectProvince”).val();

setInitialStates(
onlineMonth,
currentMonth,
offlineMonth,
onlineDay,
currentDate,
offlineDay,

offlineYear,

);

Product Description

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life

CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.

Warm and Soft Light Led Desk Lamp, No Flicker Touch Control Desk Lights with Smart Memory Function

*Desk Lamp Specifications

Max Power Voltage: 100V-240V, 50/60Hz

Power Output: 7W

Lumens: 650 LM

5 Color Temperatures: 3000-6000k

*Packing List

1 x Desk Lamp

1 x USB Power Cable

1 x User Manual

*One more USB charging port LED desk lamp help to charge another device when working, studying, reading.

*LED desk lamp with 5 color temperatures and 10 brightness levels to choose from warm light to cool white (3000K-6000K).

*Table lamp desk light with 30/60 mins of automatic timing setting, energy-saving and auto turn off when the time is up.

*Smooth surface with slide and touch control is easy to turn on/off, adjust color mode or brightness, set timing off.

*CUMKA LED Desk lamp with 50000 hours long lifespan ensure long time useage without changing the LED.

*Adjustable & Foldable desk lamps easy to tilt the head up 225°, arm down 90° and base swivels 160 ° to provide the best lighting angle. Easy fold flat to carry and space saving.

Wide Application Desk Lamps for Home Office School for Reading Studying Working

Various Lighting Modes & Eye-Friendly LEDCUMKA table lamp has 5 color temperatures (from 3000K to 6000K), each with 10 brightness levels,which equals 50 modes, just easily and quickly via sensitive touch sensor switch to adjust. This led lamp is perfect for work,reading and study. Desk lamp with usb charging port has energy-saving full-spectrum LED beads with soft eye protection features to relieve eye fatigue,no flicker,no shadow characteristics,meeting your needs in different environments.
Auto Timer Setting & Memory FunctionCUMKA small desk lamp has 30/60 minutes automatic light off timer, even when you fall asleep under the reading lamp while reading at night, the set time will automatically turn off the light when it’s up, saving power. The led desk lamp also has a memory function that allows you to memorize the color and brightness of the light and adjust it freely, making it easy to store your personal settings for the next use.
Multi-Angle Adjustments & Space SavingThe head of the office desk lamp can be rotated 225°, the arm can be folded 90°, the swivel base can be rotated 160° ，making the lighting more flexible, so it can be adjusted to any lighting angle you need at a large angle. The base of the led desk lamps measure 7×4.3 inches, this office lighting takes up little space on the table, but it can light up a large area. The desk lights are perfect for use in living room, reading room, bedroom, office, etc.
Long Lifespan & After-Sales ServiceCUMKA wireless charging lamp have a lifespan of 50000 hours, never need replace a bulb,40 times longer than a typical incandescent light, reducing energy consumption and saving power, we also provide a power cable for faster and more stable charging. We offer a 12-month warranty, if you have any questions about the desk lamps, please contact us anytime.

CUMKA Professional Led Desk Lamp Designed for Your Bright and Clear Life


  • CUMKA led desk light with usb charging port equipped 52 PCS eye protection LED, there is no flicker and no shadow, soft light that protects your eyes.
  • Professional office desk lamp with quality head and arm, non-slip bottom make CUMKA desk lamp sturdy and modern.
  • Long desk lamp head, cast a broader span of light .With the premium heat sink, which makes the usb desk lamp have better heat dissipation function and extend the lifespan of the desk lamp. Stable led desk light, non-flickering light, no harsh glare.
  • Memory function of desk Lamp would store the mode used last time, no need to readjust it when you turn it on next time.
  • LED desk lamp can be given to anyone you love and care as a gift on any occasion and festival, such as birthday and various festivals.


Warm and Soft Light Led Desk Lamp, No Flicker Touch Control Desk Lights with Smart Memory Function

*Desk Lamp Specifications

Max Power Voltage: 100V-240V, 50/60Hz

Power Output: 7W

Lumens: 650 LM

5 Color Temperatures: 3000-6000k

*Packing List

1 x Desk Lamp

1 x USB Power Cable

1 x User Manual

item.title: LAKOWN [2022 New] Fast Sling Puck Game, Wooden Hockey Game, Desktop Battle Paced Winner Board Games Toys, Funny Slingshot Game for Adults and Kids, Parent-Child Interaction Chess Toy Board Table Game
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) MEDIUM SIZE SET: Fast sling puck game is a game that both children and adults can play. Medium size table game toy is more for children over 6 years old. The rules are simple, just use the rubber band to bounce the chess you own through the goal to reach ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $16.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:29:18 UTC – Details)



MEDIUM SIZE SET: Fast sling puck game is a game that both children and adults can play. Medium size table game toy is more for children over 6 years old. The rules are simple, just use the rubber band to bounce the chess you own through the goal to reach the opponent’s area, and you are the winner if you hit all the chess pieces first. (SIZE: 14*9*1.2 in)
DEVELOP CHILDREN’S ABILITIES: Sling puck game is a fast-paced game. It can improve children’s concentration, hand-eye coordination and rapid response ability in fast and concentrated hits, and can keep children away from video games temporarily. This slingshot game toy can also enhance a child’s sense of competition.
HIGH QUALITY SOLID WOODEN: Wooden hockey table game toy use high-quality solid wood frames to make chess pieces and chessboards, which are durable and smooth. The surface is smooth and will not hurt the player’s hands. It can also make the chess pieces slide more smoothly. The chessboard adopts professional tenon and tenon structure can make it stronger.
FAMILY FUN OR PARTY GAME: As a desktop battle board game toy pursuing speed, it is suitable for colleague dinners, friends gathering, family entertainment, can promote colleague relations, enhance parent-child interaction which is an active atmosphere toy. Let us enjoy a relaxing leisure time with family and friends!
IDEAL GIFT FOR KIDS & ADULTS: Wooden sling hockey board game is a toy for all ages. Table game toy is made of wood, adhering to the concept of environmental protection and recyclability, without batteries. It can be used as a child’s birthday gift or as a holiday gift. Package includes: 1 chess board, 10 chess pieces, Christmas special edition box!

4.5
Price: $16.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 09:29:18 UTC – Details)

item.title: OLA ART Shut The Box Game Wooden for 2-6 Players, Wooden Board Table Math Game with 16 Dice, Board Game for Kids Adults, Family Classroom Home Party or Pub
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Price: (as of – Details) What’s the SHUT THE BOX: Wooden shut the box game is a classic traditional dice game that offers endless fun. With a new upgrade that can be played by up to 6 player at same time, complete with 1 to 10 number combinations, 4 (wood) + 12 (colored plastic) dice, ... Read more
item.content:encoded:
Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:44:23 UTC – Details)



What’s the SHUT THE BOX: Wooden shut the box game is a classic traditional dice game that offers endless fun. With a new upgrade that can be played by up to 6 player at same time, complete with 1 to 10 number combinations, 4 (wood) + 12 (colored plastic) dice, it is one of the most popular math games
Origin of The Game: The history of this game is not much more than vague folklore — No one really knows when and where the game originated. It may have originated in Normandy, France around the 12th Century. It is believed to have been a popular game amongst fur trappers of the Hudson Bay Company in the 19th Century. It is said to have also been popular among sailors and fishermen. This centuries old game is great for teaching kids basic addition and subtraction. It helps to build mental math skills and is really fun to play
Endless Fun for Every Occasion：This classic pub game is a great addition to any game night of holiday get-together! Gather your friends and family around this addicting dice game, and put your math and strategy skills to the test. Whether you make some friendly wagers or just play for fun, Shut the Box is sure to entertain
Premium Craftsmanship: The wooden shut the box game is made of solid natural wood which is durable and sturdy. Premium Felt ensure the lower noise when dice hit the board so that you can focus on the game and hours of fun while playing
Multiple Ways to Play: There are different ways of playing Shut the Box. Read the instructions or you find and learn about options online by searching “How to Play Shut the Box” or “Shut the Box Game Variations”.

4.5
Price: $32.99
(as of Nov 30,2022 08:44:23 UTC – Details)

From the brand

For years, we have a love affair with multifunctional desk lamp. Our passion led us to design and produce the best desk lamp because you deserve the best. Our product provides consistent excellence quality and do it effortlessly. And we strive to provide all our customers from around the world with sincere service. It is our greatest honor to make you satisfied.

More than just lamp

LCD FUNCTION: You can press “On/Off button” for 3 seconds to turn on/off the LCD screen light. Includes a digital clock for time, date and temperature display. Set an alarm or time for your desk light. Remove clutter from your office desk!
EYE CARE TECH: Bright and eco-friendly LED lighting with an anti-glare shade. 5 levels of adjustable brightness for clear reading and studying without eye strain.
THREE MODULES: 3 colors temperature available(Warm White/ Natural White/ Cold White) for work(office), reading(studying), relaxation(bedroom) and more.
FOLDABLE DESIGN: LED desk lamp with 180 degree flexible arm and 90 degree base axis. The foldable design saves space and you can carry it anywhere in the office, living room, bedroom, dormitory and any other places.

Read more

Read more

Sleep Mode (Can turn off the blue light)

Intimate design, Long press the power button for 3 seconds to turn on / off the LCD display blue light, so you won’t be disturbed when you sleep at night.

Wireless charging & USB Charging Port

Suitable for Mobile phones with QI Wireless Charging Function.

Charge your mobile devices and keep them with reach.

A Light for All Occasions

From work to study, from reading to rest, this desk lamp provides all the lighting you need.

Read more

Eye-Caring Table Lamp

No flicker, less blue light and no glare lighting can protect your eyes from fatigue and vision

loss during reading drawing, working, etc.

Touch Control & Phone Holder

Light touch dimming, the light color temperature and brightness intensity can be adjusted freely.

Hiding smartphone holder, convenient for prop it up for viewing.

Perfect Gift Box

Perfect for anyone: A gift that everyone would love. Beautifully packaged and gift-ready for any occasion such as birthdays to special holidays.

From the brand

For years, we have a love affair with multifunctional desk lamp. Our passion led us to design and produce the best desk lamp because you deserve the best. Our product provides consistent excellence quality and do it effortlessly. And we strive to provide all our customers from around the world with sincere service. It is our greatest honor to make you satisfied.

More than just lamp

LCD FUNCTION: You can press “On/Off button” for 3 seconds to turn on/off the LCD screen light. Includes a digital clock for time, date and temperature display. Set an alarm or time for your desk light. Remove clutter from your office desk!
EYE CARE TECH: Bright and eco-friendly LED lighting with an anti-glare shade. 5 levels of adjustable brightness for clear reading and studying without eye strain.
THREE MODULES: 3 colors temperature available(Warm White/ Natural White/ Cold White) for work(office), reading(studying), relaxation(bedroom) and more.
FOLDABLE DESIGN: LED desk lamp with 180 degree flexible arm and 90 degree base axis. The foldable design saves space and you can carry it anywhere in the office, living room, bedroom, dormitory and any other places.

Read more

Read more

Sleep Mode (Can turn off the blue light)

Intimate design, Long press the power button for 3 seconds to turn on / off the LCD display blue light, so you won’t be disturbed when you sleep at night.

Wireless charging & USB Charging Port

Suitable for Mobile phones with QI Wireless Charging Function.

Charge your mobile devices and keep them with reach.

A Light for All Occasions

From work to study, from reading to rest, this desk lamp provides all the lighting you need.

Read more

Eye-Caring Table Lamp

No flicker, less blue light and no glare lighting can protect your eyes from fatigue and vision

loss during reading drawing, working, etc.

Touch Control & Phone Holder

Light touch dimming, the light color temperature and brightness intensity can be adjusted freely.

Hiding smartphone holder, convenient for prop it up for viewing.

Perfect Gift Box

Perfect for anyone: A gift that everyone would love. Beautifully packaged and gift-ready for any occasion such as birthdays to special holidays.

Read more

Product Description

How to play the fast sling puck game?

Each player has five pucks on their side. Now, who’s going to go first to make a move? You can decide this on your own or flip a coin to decide. The winner of the toss will go and make the first move. Players place a puck on the elastic band and try to slingshot the pucks through the hole in the middle to the other side. This exciting, fast-paced game will come to an end when one player cleared all his pucks on the board. Players are allowed to use only one of their hands to grab and push the pucks on the other side.

Perfect Gift

A great game makes a great gift. The sling puck game can be a perfect gift for Easter, Thanksgiving, and Christmas. The neat size of the game is portable and can be taken along with to bar, camping, etc.

Package Specification: 1 x Box 1 x Puck board 10 x Pucks

Sling Puck Game

Sling puck is a fast-paced game where two players compete by firing pucks to the opponents’ side. The first player with no pucks on his side wins. During the exciting game night, the sling puck game helps you unwind after work.

Premium Solid Wood

The chunky pucks made of solid wood are sturdy and well-crafted. With burr-free wood enhances smooth touch while playing. The Coogam sling puck game will soothe your daily stress and make for laughter.

Lighten Your Tension

While it’s a two-player game, it can be even funnier when playing with families and friends watching on the side. They will cheer for their favorite player as if they were watching a real competitive game; scream gladly for the winner.

Premium Solid Wood: High-quality sling puck board games are made of sturdy wood, long-lasting material that is thick and firm for multiple plays. The two puck firing strings are made of strong and durable elastic.
Eye-catching Design: Exquisitely made bright pucks contrast an attractive grass football field presents visual impact to your kids. Sharpen your child’s focus while gaining quicker responses in this fast-paced game. A pretty engaging board game that will keep them play for hours away from electronics.
Family Fun Time: This is a great board game for parents-kids to bond over. The Coogam sling puck board game offers an opportunity to develop social skills and intelligence. Kids get to improve their relationships with parents and friends while having a lot of fun out of it.
Soothe Your Anxiety: Without complicated rules, the sling puck board gameplay simply by ejecting the pucks through to the other side, a perfect game for hand-eye coordination practice as well as relaxation.
Screen-Free Activity: Still struggling to find the balance between digital and real-life connections? Coogam sling puck board game provides a screen-free quality time for kids and family, as a gift for boys and girls, or to have fun at parties.

How to play the fast sling puck game?

Each player has five pucks on their side. Now, who’s going to go first to make a move? You can decide this on your own or flip a coin to decide. The winner of the toss will go and make the first move. Players place a puck on the elastic band and try to slingshot the pucks through the hole in the middle to the other side. This exciting, fast-paced game will come to an end when one player cleared all his pucks on the board. Players are allowed to use only one of their hands to grab and push the pucks on the other side.

  • 1 x Box
  • 1 x Puck board
  • 10 x Pucks

From the brand

Who Are We?

SUBMATCHES was founded in 2013, Focus on household goods, research and development, design, production, sales, e-commerce operation and industrial chain system construction, provide one-stop home storage tools for people all over the world, helping people improve their living environment, improve the efficiency of living space utilization, and create a warm and comfortable home and office environment

Unique & Creative Organizer

Best-Selling Storage Bins

Best-Selling Desk Organizer

Our Mission

Delivering a sophisticated home lifestyle, enhance the happiness of home life of hundreds of millions of families.

Make Your Home More Neat, Minimalist and Comfortable

Selected the best designers in the industry to find the product design that connects life and art, selected luxury materials, set up high quality and advanced production workshops, and strictly control quality standards.

User Experience Comes First

Create more life experience of user value, continue to meet the user’s pursuit of beauty with creative and unique design, to create a sophisticated life

【STRONG SELF-ADHESIVE DRAWER】 The hidden drawer under desk can apply to various occasions such as office,kitchen, living room, bedroom, study rooms, dressing rooms. Due to the transparent plastic, it’s easy to access whatever you need at a glance. Help to organize your desk and save space. Convenient to clean it as well.
【STRONG LOAD BEARING】The desk drawer attachment is able to bear weight up to about 11lbs and withstand for years of daily use . No worry about falling off. It’s super sticky. The drawers can be repeatedly attached to the underside of desk and slide open/close pretty smoothly.
【LARGER CAPACITY】 The dimension of 2-layers desk drawer organizer is 9.25X7.95X6.1inch, so it can hold lots of items with different sizes, like calculators, pencils, books, smartphones, earphones, cosmetics, forks, underwear, towels, etc. So well to free space on the desk and keep it clean and organized.
【EASY TO INSTALL】 Drill& hole- free self-adhesive under desk drawer is easy to install on smooth wall with two tapes. It perfectly protects your desk or closet from damaging. It arrives with two adhesive strips, press the adhesive tape a bit make sure the tape adheres strongly to the surface.
【SUPERIOR QUALITY】 Under desk drawer slide out is made of environmental-friendly ABS+benzene material and stronger adhesives, it is thickened, wear-resistant, water proof and dust-proof.BETTER USE IT AFTER 24 HOURS FOR BETTER ADHESIVE EFFECT, IF IT WAS BROKEN WHEN YOU RECEIVE OR FELL OFF AFTER APPLY IT, PLS FEEL FREE TO CONTACT US, WE WILL REFUND YOUR MONEY OR SEND NEW ONE.

Production

  • The self-adhesive storage drawer underneath desk is widely applicable in living room, office, study room, kitchen, bathroom, etc.
  • Large capacity with double layers is ideal to hold a large amount of items as you like, easy and quick to grab what you need inside. Perfect to declutter your desk and won’t take up desktop space.
  • Superior material allows you to place heavy items without falling off, durable and sturdy for years, water proof and dust-proof as well. The smooth surface will not hurt your hands.
  • It is a easy and smart way to have a personalized organizing space under desk!

Read more

The hidden drawer pencil tray is very convenient for the underside of the table, paste them anywhere as you need to hold various items.

Bedroom

  • Our hidden self-adhesive drawer helps you organize your underwear, socks and so on.
  • It prevents dust from entering inside, much more clean and healthy to your healthy.

Study Room

  • You can easily spot whatever you want inside at a glance due to its transparency.
  • Greatly save your time to get your work completed.

Office

  • No need digging. No messy any more on your desk or closet.
  • This is a smart way to have a personalized organizing space under desk!

Read more

Large Capacity

With two layers, and even two packs as you need, it can hold lots of items with different sizes, like not only calculators, pencils, books, staplers, notes, but also eyeglasses, smartphones, earphones, cosmetics, forks, underwear, towels and so on. So well to free space on the desk and keep it clean and organized.

Unique Features

Load Bearing Capacity

Our product is able to bear weight up to about 10lbs and withstand for years of daily use .

No worry falling off. It’s super sticky. The drawers can still attach and slide in and out pretty smoothly without issues.

  • [Free Drills] Attached securely and easily! No need to drill holes into the desk with no-tracing pasting.
  • [Easy Installation] Just peel the top paper off and attach. Make sure the surface you’re attaching it to is flat and clean, and the space under desk is spacious enough to hold it.
  • [ high quality] Made of ABS+ benzene material and stronger adhesives, it is thickened, wear-resistant and water proof and dust-proof.

Read more

Installation Step

Step One

(Before installation, wipe the wet, oil, dirt, wax and other items on the desktop before sticking it)

Peel off the surface layer of the tape

Step Two

Paste double sided tapes on the back and press hard on it.

Step Three

Peel off the surface layer of each tape

Step Four

Paste the back side of the tape to the smooth bottom of the desk. Press up a little bit. Better use it after 24 hours for better effect.

Read more
